title: His Abductor's Desire
description:
Montana Territory, 1887
Heiress-turned-outlaw Charity Blake is determined to get back the fortune the Davenport banking family took from her father�even if she has to hold Brent Davenport ransom to do it! After all, the seductive charmer stole something even more valuable from her five years her heart. But once she has Brent in chains, Charity must face the fact that her desire for the man has grown from the sweet dreams of a young girl to the unquenchable passion of a woman. And soon it's not clear whether she's the captor, or the captive….
author: Harper St. George
